item.name: Change F19 to Hyper Key
item.appendix: Requirement: Set a key (i.e. Left Option Key) to F19 in Seil to act as HYPER Key system-wide
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F19, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Change F18 to Meta Key
item.appendix: Requirement: Set a key (i.e. Left Control Key) to F18 in Seil to act as META Key system-wide
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F18, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Change F17 to Left Control Key
item.appendix: Requirement: Set a key (i.e. Capslock Key) to F17 in Seil to act as Left Control Key system-wide
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F17, KeyCode::CONTROL_L

item.name: Remap Left Command Key to Hyper Key
item.appendix: External keyboard only, Macbook retains its original key function
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Remap Left Control Key to Left Command Key
item.appendix: External keyboard only, Macbook retains its original key function
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::COMMAND_L

item.appendix: External keyboard only, Macbook retains its original key function
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Remap Left Control as Left Command Key
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::COMMAND_L

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CONTROL_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT
